entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
